Blog.post: .. =) .. im all smiles all the time.. if u no me u no thats tru!.. im the one to make erryone happy!..

i miss havin a boyfriend.. yeah.. but me not havin a boyfriend let me met becca.. who i love so much!.. u would figure with tthe whole beau think we would hate each other!.. but u now we talked thru it and i love her too death!.. shes so awsome!.. even tho she gets the guy.. shes cool!.. in alot of ways im happy beau and me broke up cuz other wise i wouldnt have met becca.. well i knew her but i unno.. we never talked!.. shes so cool!.. i love her to death.. and right now shes in sum show chior camp and shes hating it!.. lmao.. its so funny cuz shes stuck 5 hours away with a million ppl who she dont no!.. do ur thing becca!.. i love ya gurl.. ur a great person and funny as hell!.. me and u together r so mean but its so funny.. cuz we have too much in common for our own good!...

Ryan Cabrera... omg.. ashlee simpson is so very lucky cuz this guy is so.. i mean so very sexy!

i love life!.. really i do!.. and i love ashlee simpson so much.. shes so cute and her music is me!.. i can relate to her.. urlLink .. go see her.. shes got cute pica and the one and only hott ryan from her show.. he was the opening act for jessica simpson.. and omg.. hes even hotter in person!.. i love him!.. omg.. hes so sexy.. lmao.. too bad hes ashlees huh?.. it sux but we gotta deal huh?.. ..all smiles all the time.. well maybe inside im dieing.. and no one knows.. juss bcuz im too busy makin errybody else happy?!?!?.. i have problem too ya no??.. i need help.. but all i can do is smile.. and pretend errything is okae!..
